::Symphony::

     Symphony nodded, then fired 20 shots from his machine gu=
n at Incarcinerator.
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: robertdahl 
  =
To: nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, May 06, 2001 12:55 PM
  Subject=
: Re: Slaughter and the Dark Avian/ Wild Ride


  Wildrider looked down at =
Symphony, and started to laugh. He then lifted
  his head up from behind co=
ver, and looked around. He realised what was
  going on, "Symphony, pmhahh,=
 you stay here and give me cover fire on
  that robot" he said, pointing to=
wards Incarcinerator. He jumped up past
  the hill, and transformed, hittin=
g the ground with a tire wrenching
  250mph squeal, and roared towards his =
comerades.


  OOC: So Dcoburn, Slaughter can't be detected by defense syst=
ems?

  BIC:
  As soon as Quatro launched his attack, eight hiddent laser t=
urrets
  extended out of the ground. They each then displayed four laser ca=
nnons,
  and began to all spin. Each time one made a revolution, it would f=
ire
  towards Quatro. (Your in over your head)

  Quatro's fire power passe=
d the turrets, and nailed the base, charring
  the side. Luckily they hit t=
he heavily armored side of the base.

        Yahoo! Groups Sponsor 
      =

rvice.
